thread.title: ‘Mississippi Grind’ review: It’s hard to care about these losers
thread.title_full: ‘Mississippi Grind’ review: It’s hard to care about these losers - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Steve Rubenstein
title: ‘Mississippi Grind’ review: It’s hard to care about these losers
text:
Photo: A24, McClatchy-Tribune News Service Ben Mendelsohn (center) and Ryan Reynolds play gamblers on the run in “Mississippi Grid,” a dark and gritty film with a great soundtrack. Ben Mendelsohn (center) and Ryan Reynolds play gamblers on the run...
It would be nice if the two gambling buddies who play the losers in “Mississippi Grind” were lovable losers, but they’re really just losers. Ben Mendelsohn (center) and Ryan Reynolds play gamblers on the run in “Mississippi Grid,” a dark and gritty film with a great soundtrack. It would be nice if the two gambling buddies who play the losers in “Mississippi Grind” were lovable losers, but they’re really just losers.
